author: gartung
body:
by adding using directives and also pad call to Container2D with 0's so the correct initialize function is called. Fixes these warnings: 
 /build/cmsbld/jenkins-workarea/workspace/build-any-ib/w/tmp/BUILDROOT/ba81249bb4729771235b98cb83b6e8d8/opt/cmssw/slc6_amd64_gcc530/cms/cmssw/CMSSW_9_0_CLANG_X_2016-12-13-1100/src/DQM/HcalCommon/interface/HashMapper.h:33:22: warning: 'hcaldqm::mapper::HashMapper::getHash' hides overloaded virtual functions [-Woverloaded-virtual]
                                 virtual uint32_t getHash(HcalDetId const& did) const
                                                 ^
  /build/cmsbld/jenkins-workarea/workspace/build-any-ib/w/tmp/BUILDROOT/ba81249bb4729771235b98cb83b6e8d8/opt/cmssw/slc6_amd64_gcc530/cms/cmssw/CMSSW_9_0_CLANG_X_2016-12-13-1100/src/DQM/HcalCommon/interface/HashMapper.h:45:25: warning: 'hcaldqm::mapper::HashMapper::getName' hides overloaded virtual functions [-Woverloaded-virtual]
                                 virtual std::string getName(HcalTrigTowerDetId const& tid) const
                                                    ^ 
/build/cmsbld/jenkins-workarea/workspace/build-any-ib/w/tmp/BUILDROOT/ba81249bb4729771235b98cb83b6e8d8/opt/cmssw/slc6_amd64_gcc530/cms/cmssw/CMSSW_9_0_CLANG_X_2016-12-13-1100/src/DQM/HcalCommon/interface/HashFilter.h:44:18: warning: 'hcaldqm::filter::HashFilter::initialize' hides overloaded virtual function [-Woverloaded-virtual]
                                 virtual void initialize(FilterType ftype, HashType htype,
title: DQM-HcalCommon+HcalTasks: fix clang warnings hides overloaded virtual function
